attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence that Halal blessed food is not clearly marked.
attributes.additional_details: If we are permitting Halal on the grounds of religion, we are legally bound to ensure that it is appropriately marked and alternatives are ALWAYS available lest it otherwise be discrimination.
attributes.background:
Various supermarkets and food retailers (example Marks and Spencers) do not see fit to indicate what food is Halal. 
According to the bible, Revelations 2, it is forbidden for a christian to eat food that has been offered to an idol, which is what an Halal blessing constitutes.
